title: Join the team for an URF Q&A

replies.body: Replace Dominion with URF {{summoner:31}}
Logged in to upvote. Truth be told!

why replace dominion? some people like it just because you don't doesn't other people don't.
why not just ask riot to keep urf as another gamemode instead?


rito please.
Dont have to replace, just add URF forever <3
only thing i noticed is that you dont have an urf summoner icon {{item:2045}}
as a custom game you can play dominion as urf though

The only thing that I will say during the discussion.... **KEEP URF AS A CUSTOM GAME TYPE OR SOMETHING ALONG THOSE LINES! WE ALL LOVE URF AND WANT IT TO STAY!**
{{champion:238}} {{champion:6}} {{summoner:12}}

From riot with love
> We've heard your pleas for us to keep URF mode as a permanent game mode to either have in normal queues or simply to remain as a custom game. We hear you and we apologize.

riot didn't say that tbh. But seriously riot has gone overboard in not making this mode permanent. Seriously please just let it stick around, it's a practical way for us Riven try hards to practice our combos over and over again without having to wait as long in order to get a next attempt out. I enjoy the play mode even though I don't play it as much as I did when it first came out this year, but I will always go back to it and play. I love urf it's something I'd be sad to see leave.
i restarted lol because of this mode
I prolly would say something long and drawn out about how much everyone loves urf and wants it to stay in some form or another... but I ain't got time for that :/

funny thing is, people still want to cry out "keep urf rito!!" as if riot doesnt hear their cries. They do hear our cries but they keep it around for a short amount of time for a reason, and its because more money is earned off of it when it's seasonal. which i honestly dont have a problem with because more money means more riot, but i wish they wouldnt tease us so, its painful riot, why dont u just wear sexy lingere instead if you want to tease us?
clearly. I mean. its just endless fun
I agree
Can we please keep URF as a permanent game type?
I've been asking that too! I would play league 24/7/365.
It would be great as a permanent custom with no queues imo
No, because nobody would play any other game mode!{{champion:6}} {{item:3089}}

People would play other modes, I personally only use urf to get away from all the trolls in ranked and normal games... It is kinda nice to have a game mode where nobody cares if you suck and its just for fun
sad thing is, some people do take urf seriously and still rage at you if you suck. i just laugh at them. it's ridiculous.
I don't see a problem
Will there be URF next year or will there be something different like NURF or ARRF (All Random Rapid Fire)?
+1 to ARRF :)
I would personally enjoy DBURF, Doom Bots Ultra Rapid Fire.
Maybe they could get Urf(the manatee not game mode) a brother and make a walrus named Wurf. Of course riot would make a new gamemode for Wurf
Stop Begging for URF to become permanent. Tt will be like every other Custom game mode after a month or so it becomes old. But I do like the idea of URFF (Ultra Rapid Fire Fridays)
Did ARAM ever get old? Nope.
* Decreased spawn times would be nice.
URF IS LIKE EGGNOGG WE WANT IT YEAR ROUND{{summoner:17}}
yes keep the urf mode for ever <3
Please Riot. Make the right choice. Make URF permanent in custom games. It is a good decision!
I can't believe that after a whole year of consistently requesting the return of URF mode, Riot still plans to remove the game mode after the 13th.
Doom bots vs URF
Keep URF as a custom game

WURF:

Everything gives normal exp rates.
25% less healing from all sources.
Summoner spells can be Revive, Flash, Teleport, Ignite, Ghost, or Smite. all have 100 second cooldown except smite, which is 50 seconds and has 2 charges
Turrets do 1.75x damage to champions.


kills and assists don't give gold
normal lane minions don't give gold
normal Jungle monsters don't give gold


All buildings are worth 4x personal gold, 2x team gold
Red lizard, and Blue Golem always give 2x gold
Smiting a jungle monster in the first 5 mins of the game gives 3x the entire camp's normal gold when you kill it
Smiting a jungle monster to kill it gives double the camp's normal gold and an extra stack of that camp's buff if you use the first one. (gromp does 5% extra damage return instead, wolves release a spirit in both sides of your jungle)
Cannon minion spawns every wave and gives the whole wave worth of gold if you kill it
Red buff grants 5% lifesteal and 5% attack speed in addition to it's normal buff
Blue buff gives 10% cdr that can exceed the cap, it can stack with baron buff
Scuttle crab gives 100 personal gold and 25 team gold
Baron gives 500 team gold and 10% bonus cdr on top of the normal buff, possibly exceeding the 40% cap
Dragon gives double stacks, at 5 stacks grants 200 bonus team gold instead of 6 stacks
Each ward placed past river into the enemy's side of the map gives 35 gold
placing a vision ward gives 50 gold if you have not placed one yet or it was destroyed
Sweeper has 3/4 normal cooldown and killed wards grant double gold
Farsight orb gives 30 gold every time it spots an enemy(5 seconds cd on same champ after they leave its aoe for upgraded)
Relic Shield gives normal gold for executed lane minions to owner and heals ally for double
Killing an enemy under tower grants kill gold and assist gold to all involved
Killing an enemy under your own tower grants kill gold and assist gold to all teammates involved
5 junglers team on the way{{summoner:11}}
seriously keep this game mode, why would you take away something so special?? {{item:3070}}
could urf have something new to add to it like u could ACTUALLY PLAY URF THE MANATEE as a champion but only if u go random like a sneak peek  u gotta admit thats cool
Didn't they do that on year? I heard about it; it supposably happened before I started playing. Can someone clear this up for us?
Last year Urf The Manatee was just an April Fools prank. He was mentioned but wasn't given a champion spotlight or anything. Only URF the gamemode was released.
actually, Urf The manatee was an april fools prank long before that. They featured him in one of Warwicks' old skins, so it wasn't only last year. He just makes regular appearances :)
about the whole urf staying forever i dont think it would be special if u can play it everyday but if it replaced dominion and was ULTRA RAPID FRIDAY it would solve a lot of problems
One specific day wouldn't always be convenient for players.
They should make a new champ named Dave Son of Urf who joins the league seeking to avenge his father.
why keep urf? here:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yHzpkUFsefo
they should make the finishers permament
Is it possible for URF to replace Dominion as a game mode since its less played and URF is more popular? ...Plus its a relax fun game mode
They should just keep it as a custom game
